channel.title: [SFM] Winter Chaos - Panda King And Co. Wins!
channel.description:
## [color=Cyan] Introduction: [/color] :package: ![image|426x319](upload://hL0qI3jFII4k7O55TW0aLjdQMQj.png)
- Hello and Welcome in another Forum Mafia! Because Christmas is coming i made this piece like what is Christmas without theme dedicated to it!? ###### Hosted by Twil1ght
## [color=Cyan] Rules: [/color] :christmas_tree:
1. All standard forum rules apply, as usual. 2. Any cheating, angleshooting etc are forbidden. 3. Please be respectful to other players and keep your salt through entire match to yourself. 4. Be active! After 24 hours you will be prodded and if you don’t answer in 12 hours, you would be replaced/modkilled. 5. Most importantly have fun!
## [color=Cyan] Gameplay: [/color] :video_game:
- Days are 48 Hours Long while Nights are 24 Hours Long. - This is **closed** setup in other words the rolelist AND role cards are **hidden**. - Evil Factions have a **Day** and **Night** Chat. - There is balanced amount of players in each alignments. - There may or may not be any "random" events.
## [color=Cyan] Journals and Deathnotes: [/color] :open_book: :spiral_notepad: - They are allowed. Last sended Journal would appear after you die.
## [color=Cyan] Role Cards: [/color] :card_index:
There are Santas, Elves, Reindeers and much more! Or is it like that? :thinking:
## [color=Cyan] Playerlist: [/color] :santa: 1. <S> Margaret </S> - Died Night 4 - [color=Green] Papyrus [/color] 2. <S> Marluxion </S> - Died Night 1 - [color=Green] Aoi "Santa" Kurashiki [/color] 3. <S> BlueStorm </S> - Lynched Day 4 - [color=White] Cleaned[/color] 4. Marcus_Doodalee ---> Firekitten - [color=Gold] Panda King [/color] 5. PoisonedSquid - [color=Gold] Winter Eirika[/color] 6. <S> MaximusPrime </S> - Lynched Day 5 - [color=Green] Kel'Thuzad [/color] 7. GamerPoke - [color=Gold] Ice Man [/color] 8. <S> Luxy </S> - Lynched Day 2 - [color=Orange] Ophillia Clement [/color] 9. <S> Insanity </S> - Lynched Day 3 - [color=Green] Ice Climbers [/color] 10. <S> Nerbins </S> - Died Night 1 - [color=Green] Link [/color] 11. astand - [color=Green] The Legion [/color] 12. Pug - [color=Green] Kyle Broflovski[/color]
## [color=Cyan] Backup: [/color] :+1: 1. WazzaAzza 2. Geyde 3.
## [color=Cyan] Timelaps: [/color] :timer_clock: [Spreadsheet](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=E8gmARGvPlI) [D1 / Start Of The Game](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-winter-chaos-starting-soon/74480/39) [D1 / Double Santa Reveal](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-winter-chaos-starting-soon/74480/110) [D1 No Lynch / N1](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-winter-chaos-starting-soon/74480/299) [N1 / Start Of D2](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-winter-chaos-starting-soon/74480/302) [D2 / Third Santa Reveal](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-winter-chaos-starting-soon/74480/356) [D2 / Luxy’s Lynch](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-winter-chaos-starting-soon/74480/603) [N2 / Start Of D3](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-winter-chaos-starting-soon/74480/605) [D3 / Insanity's Lynch](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-winter-chaos-starting-soon/74480/943) [N3 / Start Of D4](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-winter-chaos-starting-soon/74480/944) [D4 / BlueStorm's Lynch](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-winter-chaos-starting-soon/74480/1103) [N4 / Start Of D5](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-winter-chaos-starting-soon/74480/1104) [End Of The Game](https://forum.imperium42.com/t/sfm-winter-chaos-starting-soon/74480/1156)

item.title: [SFM] Winter Chaos - Panda King And Co. Wins!
item.dc:creator: Pug
item.description:
the funny skeleton comment was a joke but still.

I like Pap better as a character. but sans is where the memes are at.

Twil1ight:

If you didn’t enjoy it what can I say?

opinions are subjective. I agree
I’ve used this exact same argument with Maxi and my alchemist class.

item.title: [SFM] Winter Chaos - Panda King And Co. Wins!
item.dc:creator: Twil1ight
item.description:
Pug:

I complain that pap was used instead of the funny skeleton

When you learn that “funny” skeleton is overrated?

The win conditions were same as usual expect 1 Class. Also sorry but I would prefer to leave for Host how the game is going to look like. If you didn’t enjoy it what can I say? /shrug

Read full topic
